title: How long does it take to get accepted into the PBE
body: So like, I signed up for the pbe in the beginning of the year, and I barely realized now that I still haven't been accepted into it. How long does the process usually take to get accepted into the pbe?

replies.body: I applied almost 6 months ago and play almost every day, and have never gotten banned. I feel so left out because almost all of my friends have PBE accounts. I feel like I'll never get accepted at this point. :/ {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

There's no set amount of time for how long it takes to get into PBE. We select testers on a wide variety of criteria that changes constantly. One thing that remains consistent is that we tend to look for really active players who are positive in their interactions with others.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for a complete briefing on the system. Let me know if you have any questions.
